title: Nidalee making me feel things...
body:
first Trundle and now... oh god... Risotto why? I'm so confused

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f_biCoboWw0/V0TQhaV_pcI/AAAAAAAA7I4/X-b7S6rPkRwHimKYMg0VFjpKxSWCb_NWACLcB/s1600/Nidalee_Splash_3.jpg

Does it has to do with the chairs? am I a chairphillic?

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CYA7gqlUe7E/V0TQh9WQ3jI/AAAAAAAA7JA/PsQVOYQIYKosTD4gJkl3GxvlTIP7ydsTwCLcB/s1600/Nidalee_Splash_4.jpg

replies.body:
https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/13267692_590178904487039_271667688491615328_n.jpg?oh=2dc31d0e3beb319e44e4cd6b201c5a9d&oe=57E602AE
WOW，just WOW

I know right? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡° )
Look at those drapes.
Don't forget that feather duster. Oh baby.
Brings the saying "I wonder if the carpet matches the drapes" to a whole new level.
Damn, if this is the direction they're taking with splash arts you'll probably get a heart attack once they get to {{champion:21}}
Well wouldn't that be a misfortune.
When i die, that is the way i want to go out. Heart attack a la sexy.
What's a maid doing sitting on the master's chair? She's going to get punished for that

Oh she's going to get punished alright

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/hecngDdRpYk/hqdefault.jpg
"sshhh young master, your father won't know!!"
"I'll give her a suitable punishment" ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡° )
All of Nidalee's splash are incredible. I hope the next person in line is Karma as it looks like they only need to update 3 splash arts for her compared to 5 with Nid.
Next one is Sion
I would have no problem with Barbarian or Lumberjack Sion in a style like this... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Karma needs more than a splash, though.
One step at a time... one step at a time. She deserves an updated splash, at least, since it's been 3 years she got a massive update to her visuals.
eh. I like her kit the way it is currently.

Aaaargh, can't agree more. I love Karma, but i always end up using Warden and Order of Lotus skins because of the changes to Sakura. Well, she will surely get those one day, but man! waiting is always a killer. Why can't time go faster?

Well I don't wanna make the same joke again.

That splash arts are so impressive, can't wait for Karthus.

(Riot's gift to some people who wanna see more sexualized female champions)
Princess Karthus should be a thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Hige,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UGxJHkh3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-24T22:24:05.169+0000)
>
> Princess Karthus should be a thing.

Armor of the Fifth Age Karthus?
battle bunny karthus
Battle Boss Karthus?

Did she mention it's mating season?
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

> [{quoted}](name=Hige,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UGxJHkh3,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-24T22:18:11.252+0000)
>
> first Trundle and now... oh god... Risotto why? I&#039;m so confused
> 
> https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f_biCoboWw0/V0TQhaV_pcI/AAAAAAAA7I4/X-b7S6rPkRwHimKYMg0VFjpKxSWCb_NWACLcB/s1600/Nidalee_Splash_3.jpg
> 
> Does it has to do with the chairs? am I a chairphillic?
> 
> https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CYA7gqlUe7E/V0TQh9WQ3jI/AAAAAAAA7JA/PsQVOYQIYKosTD4gJkl3GxvlTIP7ydsTwCLcB/s1600/Nidalee_Splash_4.jpg

RIGHT? I think it's the powerful posturing. That Trundle had me like "O____O;"

btw i noticed that pantheon has an updated icon in the store.


http://i.imgur.com/WXbI6bx.png
thanks for putting me in teh background. Im the fan that is lurking and slightly obscured.
Why does she get such good splash art but phoenix Quinn looks poop

Because Nidalee had really low-quality splashes (being an early champion). She needed a splash art update, and now she looks wonderful! Quinn and her Phoenix skin are newer, and aren't in line for a splash art update for awhile. Her splash arts look pretty decent!

> [{quoted}](name=Aeszarck,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UGxJHkh3,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2016-05-25T00:13:58.497+0000)
>
> Because Nidalee had really low-quality splashes (being an early champion). She needed a splash art update, and now she looks wonderful! Quinn and her Phoenix skin are newer, and aren't in line for a splash art update for awhile. Her splash arts look pretty decent!

Have you lost your mind? The quality of thes4 splashes are much better than Phoenix Quinn splash...
No shit they're better quality, it's 3 years between them. There is still absolutely nothing wrong with Phoenix Quinn.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UGxJHkh3,comment-id=0006000100000000,timestamp=2016-05-25T01:20:45.823+0000)
>
> No shit they're better quality, it's 3 years between them. There is still absolutely nothing wrong with Phoenix Quinn.

What's wrong with making it look better? Like you said, 3years apart.

Nothing wrong with making it better, you're completely right there.
However!
There are some more champions who have a more dire need for splash art updates. Quinn doesn't have many skins, and and they all look pretty decent. ~~Phoenix Quinn might be a bit low on the quality side, but it's not blatantly bad, in my opinion.~~  I just checked again, and it actually looked fine to me. I'm going to recant my statement about the quality. However, on the other hand, Nidalee has a lot more skins, and ~~they all~~ most looked low quality. So that made her a prime candidate for a splash art update! 
There are still more champions like Nidalee with many poor splash arts, so unfortunately you probably won't be seeing Phoenix Quinn get updated for a long time. The artists can't work on everything, so they choose some really outdated arts and work on those.
Because I like Phoenix Quinn's splash a lot, why change for the sake of change? Then again I also think they should have kept the old {{champion:122}} splash so I might just be an idiot.
Phoenix Quinn looks great!
Does this mean Sion get his splash arts updated next?
Does this mean Sion's updated splash arts will be sexy?

> [{quoted}](name=YuGiHo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UGxJHkh3,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2016-05-24T22:48:33.640+0000)
>
> Does this mean Sion's updated splash arts will be sexy?

I... I love your name...
W-what about mine, Senpai!?

First sexy dom trundle, now sexy nidalee?!

i need to know how the twitch splash art skins will look

> [{quoted}](name=Tanukihero,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UGxJHkh3,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2016-05-25T01:36:22.128+0000)
>
> First sexy dom trundle, now sexy nidalee?!
> 
> i need to know how the twitch splash art skins will look

Kingpin Twitch is going to be so hot.

> [{quoted}](name=Aeszarck,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UGxJHkh3,comment-id=00140000,timestamp=2016-05-25T03:51:51.601+0000)
>
> Kingpin Twitch is going to be so hot.

Kingpin is by far my favorite skin, i have high hopes for it.
It'll make my kingpin rise, if you know what I mean.
Trundle X Nidalee?

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=UGxJHkh3,comment-id=00140001,timestamp=2016-05-26T00:03:16.795+0000)
>
> Trundle X Nidalee?

i don't think nid would find him or his magical aids attractive
Where is her other leg on Pharaoh?

now that you mention it, her proportions aren't really... well... proportionate, her front leg is really really big for her body and if you look away it looks like she has only one leg lol.

Her other leg is hidden by her huge left leg though, there's a small part of it.
Her left leg is lifted slighly, so it covers more than it normally would of the right leg.
that's what I figured, it seems like she's about to cross her legs, but it's an odd pose nevertheless, take a look at her torso, it's pointing forward while her hips and her legs point sideways.
whats wrong w huge legs #wonderthighsnotthunderthighs
